original_text: Many people were angry with Bartimaeus. They told him that he should be quiet. But he shouted even louder than before, ‘Son of David! Please help me!’
korean_text: 많은 사람이 꾸짖어 잠잠하라 하되 그가 더욱 크게 소리 질러 이르되 다윗의 자손이여 나를 불쌍히 여기소서 하는지라

sentences.original_text: Many people were angry with Bartimaeus.
They told him that he should be quiet.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그에게 조용히 있어야 한다고 말했습니다.

sentences.original_text: But he shouted even louder than before,
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그는 전보다 더 크게 소리쳤습니다.
